Text: This is excellent. Thank you so much for sharing this.

Question: On Neil Young's website, http://www.neilyoung.com/archives/gh_technotes_vinyl.html, it says (on the second page), 'A special bonus 7" 45 RPM mono single of "The Loner" b/w "Sugar Mountain" was included ...'. But "The Loner" sounds stereo to me (agreeing with your download notes and artwork). Why does Neil Young's website say the song is in mono?

My guess is that they just goofed. The track is indeed stereo as is indicated on the 45rpm label.
Thanks all for the comments.

-DLedin
Thanks for answering, Dledin. And once again, thank you so much for sharing this.
Any chance of getting a Hi-Res version that's above CD quality?  Thanks!

Thanks for this and taking the care to preserve the 'quality' of music.
cheers
Nice job -  very clean. Would love the 96kHz files :-)
Clearly better sound than CD..This sounds REAL!!!  Thanks bloke
